website_summaries.verdict: They have an attractive price tag, but similarly priced competitors offer more durability.
pros: Full UV400 coating keeps out even the tiniest UV rays
cons: The fragile frame can break when attempting to swap out lenses

customer_reviews.title: Loved the glasses until I switched to the black polarized ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the glasses until I switched to the black polarized lenses. The black lenses are much thinner than the rest and kept on popping out of the frames. Since the reason for me to buy these glasses was to using them while fishing during my vacation... it kinda of defeated the purpose of buying them. Going to keep them just because I really like the blue lenses for every thing else. 12/26/17 After getting a new par if black polarized lenses things worked better but after a while it got loose again. I decided that I needed the black lenses more than any other so I used crazy glue. No more problems!
customer_reviews.author: justin fair

customer_reviews.title: cheap and very bad
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, feels like it will fall apart before I get on my bike. Cheap plastic, like the one from bad toys. The holding mechanism for the lens is very bad - you move the nose piece up and down to "hold the lens in place". The problem is it does not click in, the whole thing twists and the lens moves about. Honestly the case, the soft pouch and the lens cleaning fabric are more useful. Size is for a very big head - if you have a small head these will be too large. I have a medium size helmet and these are for people with large size helmets.
customer_reviews.author: polstar1983

customer_reviews.title: Good Side Protection
customer_reviews.text: Good value. The polarized lens is awesome. I use these for stand-up paddle boarding where the sun is intense from several angles. Good side protection. Lens changing is easy (after a little practice) if you don't pay too much attention to the instructions and just look closely at how they are attached. Two of the lenses are a blue tint which I don't use, but the Yellow lens is great for cloudy days. A little "squeezy" on my size 7 3/4 head but that helps them stay on. Overall I am quite satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: titaniumbutt

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Interchangeable!
customer_reviews.text: Love my RIVBOS!! My husband ordered them for me and I returned the favor and ordered him a set because I loved my so much! Comes with a carrying/storage case. Several lenses for various weather conditions and easy to change out lenses once you figure out how. My only complaint, as a woman with long hair, is the side of the frames tends to pull my hair. I totally understand this helps the glasses stay in place. Not a deal breaker though. I’ve learned how to strategically remove the glasses without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stump

customer_reviews.title: The $20 Ironman shades from Walgreens are far superior in every conceivable aspect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before expected delivery date, which is always a pleasant surprise. However, I only received a single pair of sunglasses. Excluded were any case, cleaning cloth, interchangeable lenses, and the frames I received appear to be unable to accommodate interchangeable lenses. Bottom line, I did NOT receive what I ordered. Beyond that, the quality of the frames leaves much to be desired. Stiff, inflexible, brittle-feeling plastic and unable to fully open both earpieces. Uncomfortable and unforgiving fit. These do not appear/feel to be designed to last under moderate, much less, rigorous wear. The $20 Ironman shades from Walgreens are far superior in every conceivable aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: They look great, feel really light, and polarized lens look like oakley polarized. I had oakley and loved them but they stopped making specific style lens for M frame and decided to save 200 bucks and buy these. They look crystal clear. Many people in reviews mentioned how they couldnt get lens off, well im must have gotten the updated version because all you pull down nose piece and it slips down and opens to allow you to pop out lens. Worked great for me, no struggle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bar

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are okay, but not much else.
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses themselves are not terrible. Not high quality and typical of those brands, but good for the money. However, the cord/strap to attach to the sunglasses was a problem. First, it was weird and didn't seem to match anything on the actual sunglasses. Second, one end broke within seconds under very little pressure. Irreparable. So that part went into the trash. Just be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Stay well in place, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair (thanks to my dog who keeps eating them...sigh) in two years. I keep buying the same kind because they stay in place super well even on my sleek hair, I can run and exercise in them easily, and they are very reasonably priced. The inter-changeable lenses means that I can wear the glasses when I run or when it's super sunny by simply switching the lens.
customer_reviews.author: sonia.g

customer_reviews.title: SWEET!  An accessory you don't want to be seen without!  2 Thumbs Up.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just received and I love them, have only tried the lens that came attached, but when I went outside everything was clearer, brighter and so much better. I love the sleek look of the frame, the additional bag to keep the glasses in and even the cord to hold them around my neck, but the slimness of the cord looks better with my prescription glasses that I use the thicker yellow cord for these. I look forward to many years of enjoyment and hope to purchase another pair for my mom and my aunt. These come in multi color frames and lenses and are perfect for practically everyone. I give my 5 star of approval.
customer_reviews.author: RickySoFine

customer_reviews.title: Not made well!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to reach out to this company several times...I like the look of the shades, but the last two pairs I’ve purchased the arm has broken off within two weeks, and you will not here back from them if you email. Then I look at the reviews and I say, “hmmmm” is it me or maybe my head is just to big, because how do they have decent reviews! I can honesty say their customers service sucks and they won’t reply to your emails!!! I wouldn’t recommend the shades due to issues I’ve experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Tagos

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. I got these for softball and while I knew they were going to be on the cheaper side, I was not expecting the plastic to deform from heat. I keep them in the case in the car and when I pulled them out for a game the left arm had a bend in it and the glasses are now crooked on my face. I'm going to try and lightly heat them with a lighter and see if they can be remodel but these are not worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ap

customer_reviews.title: Frame broke first day. - Zero customer service despite “lifetime warranty.”
customer_reviews.text: While trying out the different lenses, and following directions, the frame cracked. Sigh... Will be returning them. Update: Turns out, there are NO returns on this product, my son attempted to contact the vendor for a warranty replacement, but 3 weeks and NO response. Update: made 2nd attempt to contact vendor, again no response.
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Box Guitar John

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Quality, fit, features and price all in one.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work extremely well at a very affordable price. I have two pairs that I use for running. The assortment of lenses that are included is great and very easy to change out. They are lightweight, durable and do not bounce when running. Only 4 vs 5 stars as they are not completely optically clear like my Oakley's but they are 1/3rd the price. The ventilation works great as well and does not fog up. They look awesome on as well!
customer_reviews.author: John McDermott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only received one lens and it had a scratch on it... If I had received all items, I may have been satisfied. Jasper Carmen was the seller, maybe if you buy it officially from RIVBOS this wouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: the lenses are amazing and there's an instruction sheet that shows you the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not for small faced women. they don't conform to your face and stick out on each side near the eyes, but for the price and what you get, you can't really beat it. the lenses are amazing and there's an instruction sheet that shows you the preferred use of each lens. A gray hard backed case is included and the lenses have a protected Velcro spot inside; each with it's own respective slot. switching out the lenses is especially easy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fits big noses but keeps the lenses where they need to be!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Rivbos I have ordered in the last few years and they are super comfortable. My first pair broke after being dropped many times. Finding sunglasses that fit is incredibly difficult because I have an incredibly large nose. Some glasses that do fit don't keep the lenses close enough to actually turn down the brightness on life, but these are just right. My only gripe is one of the swappable lenses doesn't fit as snug in the frame as I would like, but they are great for the price and I may just need to adjust them some more.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of glasses that were like my Oakley but not $200. These are just that but not having to pay over $50 replace the lenses that scratch and are not covered. I will never buy another pair of Oakley's again. The price is amazing. The quality is just as good and easy to change lenses. These are the best the polarized lenses are great for all outdoor visions. They give you all the lenses you will need for any activity. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Paolo DeFonseca

customer_reviews.title: Great value cycling glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great. I can understand the comments about people breaking these during a lens change, but as long as you take your time and don't force any thing, they should be fine. They are awesome glasses for what they are. I needed to cheap standins while I send my Rudy Project lenses in for replacement (scratches, lots of them), and these fit the bill nicely. I don't treat my glasses gently, so I opted for these, and am waiting for some Foakley Jawbreakers to come in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mikebergy

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are decent sunglasses. The build is a little weak, but so far nothing bad has happened to them. They are relatively easy to change the glass in them. The only main complain is that the "blue mirror" glass has a gradient of the yellow tint while looking through, so it is more yellow in center, but faded toward top and bottom of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L.

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors and the uniqueness of these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and the uniqueness of these glasses, I'm thinking of ordering another set with different colors and these will accessorize everything I wear..some people it's shoes, others it watches, mine is sunglasses. I was a little concerned about changing out the lenses, but they were easy and not fragile as I was a little worried about that but so far, no problems. I keep them in the cases so no scratches...many compliments om the shades and it's​ like getting 5 pair of shades for the price of one...I ride a motorcycle so even the clear come in handy..the yellow for the rain and the light blue for the dreary days.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend trying to use the other lenses that they come ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I purchased two pairs of these and they didn't last very long. If you get a set, I don't recommend trying to use the other lenses that they come with as it's near impossible to get the new lens correctly fitted back into the frame. I broke the frame on my first pair by trying to get a new lens back in. The frame on the second pair broke when I dropped them onto a carpeted floor one day. The weak point in the design is the hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Siegel

customer_reviews.title: True polarization in a snug fit that sits close to your face
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The polarized lenses can making looking at a phone troublesome, but even in heavy rain, they actually enhanced my visibility. Changes lenses is easy, and they fit very well (although, my head is larger than average). I like the snugness--they do not move around, even when running, and they fit close to my face, which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunglasses gift to a bike rider
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to my husband. He needed sunglasses for bike night ride. He wanted yellow lenses to block the light in the night. These were getting 5 pairs in a price of one, easy to change lenses. Great quality and can fit any weather and any time of day due to the different lenses. It comes with many accessories. A sleeve to hold all the lenses that are not in use, a box to keep the sunglasses, a soft towel to clean, etc. great gift. My husband loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rama

customer_reviews.title: No Fogging on Bike Rides or Trail Runs
customer_reviews.text: My nose has been broken 3 times and they contour to my nose without being crooked. I wore them on a overcast 12 mile mountain bike ride in Aliso Viejo with the yellow lens which highly increased clarity. The extra openings prevented the lenses from fogging up. I wore on a 10 mile trail run at El Moro Canyon with the polarized lens and had no fogging issues. They look and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Doo Doo Flags

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love this pair of sunglasses. I didnt want to pay an arm and a leg for a pair of nice looking sunglasses and i found a great pair in these. Had them for three years and theyve withstood the test. Have taken them hunting, rafting, to the pool, beach, hiking, and more and theyve been great. Would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a cheaper alternative to good working sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the low-cost
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a very inexpensive pair of sunglasses with a much higher-end look and design then you can't go wrong with these. With 5 lenses to chose from and a great hard-cover protective case you can afford to buy them just to leave in your car, boat or motorcylce as a great back-up pair of glasses. My wife likes hers very much as she can change the lenses to fit the situation for fashion or stick with the polarized lens for when we're on the bike. Good choice and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Blazek

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son. He is a baseball player. He has cracked several pairs of sunglasses over the last couple years. He really likes these as they have one lense and came with 5 lenses!! He's still on the first one... I will be ordering more for his stocking stuffers!! I liked the great price and quality. He's a teenager and all about name brand recognition. I was not paying over $100+ for glasses. This was a fabulous compromise. His friends asked where he got them. Win win for both of us!!
customer_reviews.author: SusanC.

customer_reviews.title: Great sport cycling glasses, multi lens, nice case & a great value.....
customer_reviews.text: My cyclist daughter & son love these. They're a decent knock off of super expensive sport cycling glasses, without the name or price. Comes with a cool case & several lenses. Not my style as I'm a dignified older male cyclist - and these fit too tight on my wider face - but thery're great if you can't afford the name brand "XXXleys" that they're styled after. But amazing quality for just $25 ish price !
customer_reviews.author: EastTexasRider

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and a great price for all the lenses and hardcase, soft case, and lens rag it comes with. Very pleased. I'm not the type to spend hundreds of dollars on sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtin C. Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller heads!
customer_reviews.text: Fits smaller heads nicely, looks cool, sits conformable on the nose, but temples are tad long for me and touch the fit adjustment band on my helmet. I am adult, but wear a youth helmet by Nishiki. On my Bell Woman's helmet, it is less of an issue because of a somewhat different fit system design. Regardless, I liked the glasses so much, I plan on cutting off the temple tips a bit (5 mm) and polishing the ends smooth. I did receive the wrong color frame and exchanged for what I initially wanted.
customer_reviews.author: eShopper

customer_reviews.title: Heck of a deal
customer_reviews.text: For a pair of polarized sunglasses under $30, it's a heck of a deal. For a pair of interchangeable sunglasses under $30, it's a heck of a deal. I do have three reasons for not giving 5 stars. One, they do fog up when I disc golf in the heat. Two, it's a pain in the butt to change the lenses. And three, only one of the lenses are polarized. Overall though, these are similar to my old Oakley sunglasses that cost 6x as much and they are better at staying on.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great they different lenses are very handy and they are very a comfortable fit. Changing out the lenses is very easy and they're all contained in one storage case. Good looking glasses at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim BME

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the Upgraded one. The nose strip which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Upgraded one. The nose strip which is an important mechanism to change the lenses appears to be very flimsy. I was trying on the difference lenses, just to see how they all are, and I started to notice that the locking mechanism for the nose strip was getting looser by each lense change. I figure it won't be durable to last a 20 lense changes before it just starts to fall off. Will be returning them soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nishad

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: I received a completely different pair of sunglasses. The pair I received has a full frame under the lens; they're hideous. They also seem to be really, really cheaply made. I wouldn't wear them for free. Complete garbage. I also didn't receive any of the 5 extra lenses or a case or anything else that some of the other reviews claim. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: What a value!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic pair of sunglasses. Initially I had some trepidations about buying glasses like this when I was so used to Ray-Ban and Oakley and all the other "high end" sunglasses. Man, that's the last time I ever spend 200 bucks on sunglasses again. What terrific performance and the interchangeable lenses are absolutely phenomenal. The case, soft carrying case, croakies, all of it. Quality. I'm so happy I made this purchase. Oh, and they look sharp as hell, too. That helps (;
customer_reviews.author: Owen Gayzur

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I now own 2 different pairs of these and will be buying more! I am very impressed with the quality and durability! An excellent value, with 5 different lenses and since 75% of my job is driving I am prepared for any driving or outdoor conditions! In addition to the lenses, you get a lanyard, a microfiber bag and my favorite...the zip up case with a clip! I have and will recommend these glasses to everyone! They arrived on time and I am very pleased with this product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these a year ago, liked them so much I bought another pair. I have worn Oakley Radar Path sunglasses for years, these are very close to the same sunglasses for one tenth of the cost. Great selection of replacement lens to boot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Fallin

customer_reviews.title: Great cycling shades!
customer_reviews.text: Great specs for this price. You get a lot for your money -- nice frames, 5 lenses, cool case, lens cloth and a neck chain (which I've never use). I cycle a 35-mi path, 1-3x a week here in Chicago, and these are very good glasses. - QUALITY: Solid frames, great fit - GRIP: Nice rubber-grip arms; they stay on your head and don't bounce during rides - LOOK: Cool design, cool looking - LENS: Love the single piece lens; very 'Terminator' - ALMOST PERFECT: If only they came with a photochromic (transition) lens.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J. Mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Ear Piece/Hinge Replacement
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were purchased in 2017, my husband had the hinge break on the right hand side. Do you offer replacement ear pieces/hinges?
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Manning

customer_reviews.title: Switching lenses
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck. However you have to be very careful when changing out lenses and follow directions for the style frames you have. There are three. On mine the nose part slides up and down to remove but not easily, I had to push the pin with a toothpick to get it to lock the lenses back in. Frames are flexible but feel like they will break if you try to man-handled the lenses in or out. At first it may be frustrating but take your time the first few times. It's gets more routine after a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Servicable but plastic hinges aren't very strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in Oct 2016 and the hinge broke May 2018. Pretty good run for the cost but still would be nice if they were a little more durable. I also had to super glue the little screws in the hinge after the first few months to keep the screws from coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My Son is really happy with these Sports Sunglasses and all the different lenses that come with them and lots of more items for a very good affordable price. The only problem is that they come in one size only and it's sorta big on my son.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Best decision for sunglasses ever!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glasses! I can't believe they were only $20! I was about to order a name brand for almost $200 when I figured I'd see what was on Amazon. After reading the reviews on these I figured I'd give them a try. I couldn't be happier. The day after they arrived I went for my run. Even when my face was sweating and slick from sunscreen, they never moved once, not even a little bit! I love these things!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I use these for water sports and by the pool when I don't want to risk damaging or losing my far more expensive sunglasses. Bonus - the clear lens is great for going to the range. Much more comfortable than some of the standard eyewear. Obviously not a certified safety lens, but will keep a shell from bouncing into your eyes just as well as anything.
customer_reviews.author: briandsrq

customer_reviews.title: Replacement lenses are too small
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses well enough. I have a very large head and it is hard to find glasses large enough that dont give me a headache. Have had no issues with these. My complaint is that the only lenses that fit tightly are the ones that came with it. I have tried changing them over to the black polarized set and they fit so loosely in there they try to fall out. I compared them to the set of lenses that came in the glasses and fit tight and they are cut smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Pabes13

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy looking but kinda cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teen to wear to baseball practices and games - he loved the way they look like the pros. While cool looking, they aren't great in quality or ease of use in swapping out the lenses. It's hard even for me to snap the nose piece in place that holds them in. Flimsier than I hoped, I don't have high hopes for them lasting all season. You get what you pay for I suppose. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patch's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Low price, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses look cool, they don't feel cheap, and they come with so much for the price. Mine came with several different lenses which are very easy to take out, a carrying case, a cleaning cloth, and a sort of necklace thing if you want to use it. The polarization is pretty nice and better than most sunglasses I've seen at similar prices.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Look good - But cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: When I got these sunglasses I was impressed Nice case and accessories. However I have had the sunglassesa only 1 week now and they are are broken beyond repair. If Rivbos reads these reviews I would like a replacement. I broke the nose piece off the sunglasses by simply wiping them with a cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid customer service
customer_reviews.text: First off, the case quality and overall presentation (nice hard case, additional soft case, lenses with dividers, lense cloth, etc.) is top notch. I actually like the glasses and lenses as well. Feels like you're getting a lot for your money. I did experience a problem of the frame breaking at the nose piece while swapping out lenses after a few months of use. A quick e-mail to the company, they requested a photo, and I quickly received a replacement set. Really, with such a good warranty you can't go wrong even if there are problems. I'm a happy customer and would re-buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair. I could've used the lifetime warranty for a "free" pair but decided to just buy another. First pair I left in the car and the nose piece broke off when I sat on them. Super glue worked great until I stepped on them. These are great for running. No slip, no problems of any kind. Just don't sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Phil D

customer_reviews.title: upgraded glasses are junk compared to to lower model glasses
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I ordered these as upgraded and another different pair, the upgraded pair already cracked because there so flimsy Definite not worth my money. Not even contacted by seller
customer_reviews.author: rater1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sunglasses, But Small Manufacture Defect
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect! They fit on my head sung, and it didn't feel like I had them on. These are especially great when I'm riding bike. The reason, however, I gave it only four stars out of the five was because when I received them, they had "spots" on them from where they painted the actual lenses. I didn't notice them when I had them on, but other people did when looking at me. I think this was a manufacturer defect for mine only, but I felt like I should let you know. But besides that, pretty good sunglasses for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ford

customer_reviews.title: cheap, flimsy junk
customer_reviews.text: these cheap pieces of trash are the worst sunglasses i have ever put on my face. they are bulky, flimsy, made of the cheapest plastic, and the lens dont help at all outside. the little case and neck lanyard are the only things i use from this purhase with my otger sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth pulido

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight sunglasses and fit firmly to face without wanting to fall off which is a plus when in the pool with friends. I do see people use these for riding which would completely work, but for the average Joe these are great recreational glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Buy the TR frame version
customer_reviews.text: The TR frame is worth the additional cost, the nose piece that slides down is better made and the lenses don’t fog up. I bought 2 pair of the regular and 1 with the TR frame, I will only buy the TR frame from now on. I use them for cycling, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Lenses are a little hard 2 Exchange
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it had four styles of sunglass lenses. I'm old and changing lenses hurts my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: ventilation is great, the option of changing lenses is fantastic at ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for road biking, in the florida heat, I can say they dont fog up, ventilation is great, the option of changing lenses is fantastic at this pricepoint. Packaged nicely. Sure these dont have the feel of oakleys but for what the are and how much you pay you get a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Changing Lenses is Cool
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old thinks these are so cool because you can change the lens colors. Looks sharp on him, he's a baseball player.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive with extra lenses or case.
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive with extra lenses or case. Arrived today, only one lense and no case. Even followed the link back from my Amazon app to make sure I had ordered the correct product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schrader

customer_reviews.title: ... LOVES these glasses - he says they are very comfortable - we had a little trouble switching out the ...
customer_reviews.text: my son LOVES these glasses - he says they are very comfortable - we had a little trouble switching out the lens and with little pressure actually cracked the top frame - but its not effecting the wear or look at all
customer_reviews.author: patty geiger

customer_reviews.title: quality buy love the changeable lenses I have actually hardly wear my ...
customer_reviews.text: quality buy love the changeable lenses I have actually hardly wear my 200$ pair of Oakleys any more and I got this pair to play ball in and go to the gun range and the best thing is the prescription insert included I got new glasses and also had the insert fitted with my Rx and i clip it in when i do not want to wear my contacts and it is great. I am going to recommend these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gorilla711

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine - a tiny bit longer than needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 12 yr old boy. Fit fine - a tiny bit longer than needed, but not a problem. He hasn't used them on ball field yet, but just regular sunny day wear has been great so far! They have already been mistaken for Oakley's by others and he likes that - b/c I wasn't spending that kind of money on sunglasses quite yet for him. They look great, are made well and the case, lenses and accessories are all very nice! Great deal for the price!! We are now ordering pairs for Dad and brother!
customer_reviews.author: KJones

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my XC skiing son
customer_reviews.text: Only ONE of the lenses is actually polarized, which is fine given the price-point but that isn't immediately clear when looking at the product description. The remaining lenses are not polarized. Bought these for my XC skiing son. He reports they are OK. Decent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$ For What You Get
customer_reviews.text: Product is a solid buy, you get 2 nice cases, 5 lenses and a cloth to clean the lenses. I didn't buy these as a man pair of sunglasses but only as a back up pair and to use to cut grass and for boating or when I am on the beach. Definitely would have gone 4 if not 5 but the RIVBOS logo on the side came off after a few days. It was no big deal because I just super glued it back on. Like I said earlier for everything included it worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap built but come with a protective case that has protected them pretty well when not being used
customer_reviews.text: I guess what you get for your money is okay. You can see right through the lenses and see the eyes. If I would have known that I most likely wouldn't of purchased this item. Very cheap built but come with a protective case that has protected them pretty well when not being used. These are definitely only for fishing because I tried to use them for baseball but they do not look like baseball glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT so shatterproof...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these glasses and used them for about 4 months and then one day BOOM!!! The actual "shatterproof frame" snapped when I went to adjust them on my face and cut me just above my eye. Could it have been a freak accident? Yes of course but if they snapped that easy on my face I'd really be worried about if you were hit by a ball, object, or something of any impact. I think they are a great pair for the money and look pretty stylish but that definitely was a little scary to be cut close to my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Jcamp

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product until today. I have had the sunglasses for about 2 months now and they fit great, look great, and come with polarized lenses. Having said that I was taking them off and one of the arms snapped clean off with minimal force. It was actually shocking how it broke from taking them off as I normally do.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses exceeded my expectations! They look cool and fit me perfectly!!! I have paid much more for similar glasses and there is no comparison. These win every time with all respects from fit, durability and looks. I've had these for a year now and wear them every day, rain or shine and they look as the day I bough them. I love the fact that they do not fog up during my daily 50-75 mile road cycling excursions. I'm definitely ready to get couple more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: JD Texas

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC AFFORDABLE AND VERSATILE SUNGLASSES
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC SUNGLASSES WITH THE VERSATILITY OF SEVERAL DIFFERENT COLOR LENSES FOR EVERY TYPE OF WEATHER CONDITIONS. LOVE THEM! STYLISH AND PRACTICAL. JUST SWITCH THE LENSES AND PRESTO YOU ARE READY TO GO BIKE RIDING, KAYAKING OR SKIING. I CHOOSE THE YELLOW LENSES FOR SHADED AREAS AND LATE AFTERNOON OR EARLY EVENING LOW SUNLIGHT. THE REST OF THE LENSES FOR SUNNY CONDITIONS OR MEDIUM LIGHT. VERY AFFORDABLE AND VERSATILE! THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: EliannaG

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect ANY customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the glasses, but they broke and the lenses got scratched very easily. Their email doesn't work, their website won't take comments and their facebook page looks abandoned. Buyer beware. Don't expect anyone to stand by this if there are problems.
customer_reviews.author: davenport

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: The value of this product is amazing! I've used 3 of the lenses it came with for different situations (mostly fishing during different parts of the day) and they work perfectly. The mechanism that holds the lens on is very sturdy, and I'm not afraid to break it while pulling on the nose-piece to dislodge it. They are very comfortable and fit a wide face perfectly. My only gripe is that i got the white and blue version. People frequently comment that the arms look like the colors of a toothbrush...
customer_reviews.author: Bert Klief

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! I do not switch lenses often. Blue is my favorite one. Hard to see difference from other expensive brands. I wanted to try these to use on my outdoor activities especially on the beach or mountain. I am pretty happy so far. I would highly recommend especially if you keep losing sunglasses often so you do not feel too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Aktuccar

customer_reviews.title: Very light, comfortable. Doesn't squeeze your head and give you a headache like some others. Love the brighter/lighter view.
customer_reviews.text: Very light, comfortable. Doesn't squeeze your head and give you a headache like some others. Love the brighter/lighter change in view and wear them daily. Great for driving!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but squeeky When you open and close them. I guess the plastic is a little on the cheapo side too so I think this is just a instance of "you get what you pay for". However, the extra sets of lenses are nice too have even though I won't use half of them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Just like Oakleys!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses for the price. A great go to if you don’t want to spend the money on Oakleys!
customer_reviews.author: Fishing_Is_Life

customer_reviews.title: They were cheap and fell like it. Actually they look and feel like they ...
customer_reviews.text: They were cheap and fell like it. Actually they look and feel like they were made out of toothbrush handles. The lenses are actually quite good and the case was worth the price. The croakers broke right away.
customer_reviews.author: george burnette

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses at 1/8 the price of Oakleys.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses for the price. I've had at least 5 pair of Oakleys this is a great buy at 1/8 the price. Fits my narrow face well and the last pair lasted me about 10 months with all the abuse I gave it. Swapping lenses is easy and the plastic and rubber is of decent quality. I bought two pairs this time and if the standup like the first pair then I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome on my 27-year-old
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 pairs of these. They look awesome on my 27-year-old, but they are kinda flimsy. I got a good deal on them, but would not likely buy them again. Prolly just head to Costco and get some of their sunglasses for like 30 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: MadreLobo

customer_reviews.title: Nose Piece Broke After a Couple of Uses
customer_reviews.text: I think I know why they are so inexpensive. The nose piece broke after only a few uses. I'm going to try ordering a second pair and see if I have better luck. I should have returned when they broke about a year ago but instead stashed them away. Now it's dark outside again and I need the clear glasses for the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brooker

customer_reviews.title: Runners take a look!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. I have had zero blinding while running. They are vented to prevent steaming. They come with multiple lenses for changing seasonally. Haven't used other lenses yet but look forward to seeing how they work. The fit is exceptional, they don't slip, or jostle while running.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: THE CAME BROKEN!!
customer_reviews.text: WORSTM POURCHASE EVER!! I got the gray ones and they were ok, nice for 20 bucks, this time i ordered a black ones, the plastic is really cheap, they seem to be really bad manufactured, no to count THEY CAME BROKEN!!!! Im really dissapointed, DONT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Restrepo Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Wide fit a bit too large for my face
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit to wide for my face and it felt like the frames were a bit cheap to me so I returned them. I wasn’t expecting high quality for 20 bucks but it felt like if I changed the lenses often I would break it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: CO_run

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses set up for my teen son who bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses set up for my teen son who bought them for baseball. They came quickly as described and the hard case is nice. The lenses are a little difficult to remove, but once he practiced a couple times, it was easy. I gave 4 stars because they feel pretty flimsy and time will tell if they can last through baseball season and being used by a teen boy.
customer_reviews.author: Mcphettie

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and super price. I liked them and thought they may break in. My only negative comment would be that these glasses were very tight on the back area of my head. So my wife tried them and she loved them. So I gifted them to her and she really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: FatMilkDud

customer_reviews.title: but these sunglasses are just fine. Just be careful with them as u must ...
customer_reviews.text: I always bought the oaks, but these sunglasses are just fine. Just be careful with them as u must do with all sunglasses. These Rivbos 801's will not be disappointing!! Great polarization, great ventilation, and a very cool style. I ride 700 miles a month and with competition at times, so if these glasses didn't cut it, I will tell you so! Buy them! A great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joey A.

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of cheap running glasses EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product out perfrormes items priced many times higher! The package includes an excellent case that's on par with Oakley and several replacement lenses.
customer_reviews.author: NJB1349

customer_reviews.title: New favorite sport blade
customer_reviews.text: Really like the assortment of lenses provided with this product. I have used 2 out of the 5 lenses and so far they have performed well. You have to get used to how to change the lenses out but once that is mastered, these sport sunglasses will provide the eye protection you need in any type of weather..
customer_reviews.author: Azap

customer_reviews.title: Over all nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok sunglasses can’t complain. Not Oakley’s but not looking to spend $150, $200 or more for sunglasses either. Over all nice for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: KEN HOF

customer_reviews.title: haven't broken yet.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love these glasses so far, they have a nose peace that keeps the lenses off of the skin of my face and air holes at the top helps keep them from fogging up. I saw the reviews of these braking. I wear a small / medium fitted hat and these work great for me. I bought two pairs blue frames I don't like how they look on me. But I love the yellow and green frames.
customer_reviews.author: Vanilla Gift

customer_reviews.title: Ribos tr90 801 sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I waited to review until I used them The yellow lens really good for my sensitive eyes as I get older. And continuous snowing here really great driving too.ill get another pair and the shipper excellent.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: I really like theses sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Really love these sunglasses. Would definitely buy again. They give you everything you need in the case. Lenses are also easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: dbkguy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cycling and running and they are great. I just use the black shades since it is the only one that is polarized and it works really well with dimming the sun's reflection on passing cars. They fit snugly around the ears so that I don't have to worry about them falling off while running.
customer_reviews.author: ICantBelieveThisUsernameIsntAlreadyTaken

customer_reviews.title: easy to brake
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP glasses. easy to brake, easy to scratch.. but they look good, and they are super confortable... praying god that they sell the lens separate... or put multiple in the box of the main lens.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses but I can't changes lenses. The instructions are a series of illustrations that seem straightforward. To change lenses, the first step is to remove the nosepiece. It's not budging and I'm putting enough force on it that I'm afraid that I'm going to break something permanently. I will add or subract stars depending on the seller's response to this question.
customer_reviews.author: Gawi

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality. Bought them to play softball in and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're okay.
customer_reviews.text: They look great. However, it's quite difficult to switch out the lenses and one of the sides feels like it's about to break when folding and unfolding them.
customer_reviews.author: C.Child

customer_reviews.title: With 5 to choose from it made it easy. These glasses are comfortable and fit my needs ...
customer_reviews.text: I play golf and needed lenses that have a light tint. With 5 to choose from it made it easy. These glasses are comfortable and fit my needs perfectly without paying a ridiculous price.
customer_reviews.author: Riding

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Fit is a bit snug for me, but I'll adjust. Lenses are easily changed out to suit whatever needs. Case is rugged enough for my needs, and it even came with a cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lipsitz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! They fit perfect and look sleek. The different lenses seem to be of good quality. I've have been looking to buy a pair of Oakley's but the price and quality of these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Perry

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were too wide for my face. Also, the plastic it was made out of is too flexible creating for the glasses to rest at a slant on my face. Getting many different lenses is just for fun many of the lenses do not prove to be helpful in different situations​.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

product_meta.title: RIVBOS 801 Polarized Sports Sunglasses Sun Glasses with 5 Interchangeable Lenses for Men Women Baseball Cycling Runing …
feature_bullets: FIVE INTERCHANGEABLE LENS- All the lens are 100% UV400 protection coating, blocks 100% harmful UVA & UVB Rays. Restore true color, eliminate reflected light and scattered light, make the scenery more clear and soft and protect eyes perfectly. The Main one is multi-color lens ,the yellow one is for night activities,the blue one is for beach,the clear one is for windy weather, the black one is polarized for driving and other outdoor activities.

HIGH-QUALITY PC LENS- Lens are made of high quality shatterproof PC material that is durable enough for long time using. They are suitable and interchangeable for any climate and weather conditions. And we have added UpGrade Patent Design for Switching lenses,it's easy to switch the lens now.

SUPERLIGHT, STYLISH, DURABLE- Lightweight design is ideal for usage by motorcycle and cycling bicycle, driving, running, fishing, racing, skiing, climbing, trekking or other outdoor activities enthusiasts. Fashion and stylish design, with rich color combinations of frames and lens. Polycarbonate lens and frames are impact, scratch resistant, durable and unbreakable.
LIFETIME BREAKAGE WARRANTY ON FRAME- We provide lifetime breakage and warranty on Frame and Lens.Please feel free to contact our customer service anytime if you feel unsatisfied or confused.

30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE- All RIVBOS customers enjoy 30 Day Money Back Guarantee. Customers can return and get refunded in case the purchasing is not satisfied for any reason. You have no risk to try.
